texts.es: Dúo Mely está conformado por la señora Dina Elizabeth quien se dedica a la venta de helados dulces típicos, Granola hace más de 25 años ya que su negocio lo tiene en su vivienda ya que no puede salir de su domicilio por motivos de enfermedad, ella solicita su crédito para compra de materiales en mayor cantidad como (angelitos, chocolate, anicillos, frutas, manía, nuez, palitos, cereal, chocolate blanco etc.) ya que ella actualmente entrega su producto en tiendas y hoteles pero por motivos de  no contar con suficiente capital no ha podido distribuir sus productos ya que los distribuye a un hotel semanalmente y a tiendas en su comunidad  y la demanda que ella posee en su domicilio ya que sus clientes la buscan en su vivienda. Su mayor sueño es poder poner en su casa una tienda de dulces típicos y venta de helados ya que son muy deliciosos y muy vendidos.
texts.en:
Dina Elizabeth is part of Dúo Mely. She has worked for over 25 selling traditional sweets, ice cream, and granola. She operates her business out of her home because she can't leave her room due to illness.

She is requesting a loan to purchase supplies wholesale (marshmallows, chocolate, sprinkles, fruit, peanuts, nuts, popsicle sticks, cereal, white chocolate, etc.)

Currently, she delivers her products to stores and hotels, but because she doesn't have enough capital, she hasn't been able to distribute as many as she would like. She gives her products to a hotel once a week, and to stores in her community, and she has customers who search her out at her house.

Her greatest dream is to be able to start a store selling traditional sweets and ice cream, because her products are very delicious and sell well.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make sweets to sell

loans.name: Tầm

texts.en:
Mrs. Tầm operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish.
Tầm is 34 years old, and she is married with two children.
Tầm supports two dependents with her business in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
This is Tầm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Tầm has been involved in her business for three years.
The main hardship that Tầm faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.
With her business profit, Tầm hopes for her family to be healthy and happy and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Hoa, a 25-year-old married mother of two,  lives and works in the Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. She has been operating a retail business selling dry food and general items for three years. 

The main hardship that Hoa faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is therefore requesting a loan, her first with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women, to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Hoa hopes to build a new house for her family, be healthy and happy, and have her children do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hướng

texts.en:
Hướng is 42 years old and she is married with three children. She lives and works in Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province

Hướng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Hướng faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. This is Hướng's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

In the future, Hướng hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Nguyên

texts.en:
Nguyên is 46 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Nguyên has a service business laying bricks. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Nguyên faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. This is Nguyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Nguyên hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Phương

texts.en:
Phương is 26 years old and she is married with one child. She lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Phương operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for three years.

The main hardship that Phương faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet. This is Phương's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Phương hopes to buy a motorbike, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Kigoto Twimukye Group

texts.en:
Godwin is a hard-working, married man with two children, living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He farms and sells coffee, where he earns a living, but he also earns a monthly salary for extra income. He started growing coffee to develop himself and improve his family's standard of living. He faces hardships of price fluctuations and coffee wilt, but he hopes to expand his business and become self-employed.

He is requesting a loan to buy coffee seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Forty-seven year old Ma. Teresa is a fish vendor. She sells fresh fish to the people in her community using her motorcycle as a mode of transportation.  She is a mother of three children aged 19, 15 and 9 years old. Aside from fish vending, she engages in selling Avon products like beauty soap, lotions, body sprays and other beauty products.

She needs capital to finance her existing sources of income. Ma. Teresa is asking for a loan to buy additional stock of fresh fish to resell. Because of this loan, she will be able to cater to the needs of her customers in terms of the variety of fish she sells. With this, Ma. Teresa will slowly recover. Her income will improve and eventually she will be able to afford to buy healthy food and provide better living conditions.

Ma. Teresa hopes that someday, both of her livelihoods will be properly managed and successful for the welfare of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of fresh fish to resell

loans.name: Aadi Mahila Mandal Group

texts.en:
Mayaben, the group leader featured in the center of the picture, sells ready-made clothes as part of a small clothing business she runs in Chandkheda, Gujarat, with her husband’s support. She supports her household and the education of her three children through the income she generates. She earns 4,000 Indian rupees (INR) a month, which amounts to a third of her family’s monthly income. Her contribution keeps her family financially stable, providing a buffer in any sort of crisis. 

However, the 3,000 INR that she diligently saves each month leaves no spare funds for her business expansion plans, courtesy of the cash crunch. With the future of their children's education at stake, Mayaben and her husband need to grow their microenterprise. She wants to invest in buying greater quantities of garments, such as T-shirts, shirts, and jeans. These garments enjoy a high demand from her customers. By selling more of these, she will be able to grow her revenue. Additionally, she will improve her margin by negotiating better bulk purchase rates and saving on transportation costs with fewer trips to the wholesale market. These measures will bring in an extra 6,000 INR a month. She will take home 2,000 INR and invest the rest in further expansion of her business. 

Mayaben and the four other local women microentrepreneurs in her group together seek a loan of 65,000 INR, which will be repaid over 12 months. With their share of the loan, Ishita and Chandaben will grow their clothing businesses, Vaishaliben will develop her decoration business, and Vaishaliben will grow her rakhi business. The loan will not only finance their business plans in the immediate future but will also ensure that they enjoy a better future financially and socially. 

Having had to drop out of school at an early age due to financial constraints, Mayaben is very passionate about ensuring that her children go through college. She has a preschooler, a child in primary school, and a teenager in secondary school. She wants all three of them to complete their education and access better opportunities in life. Your loan will help her make this hope a reality. She is grateful for this opportunity and your support.

loans.use: To expand her ready-made clothes business by increasing her inventory of T-shirts, shirts, and jeans

loans.name: Shirley

texts.es:
Ella es Shirley una universitaria de 24 años de edad que a través de la venta de productos de la marca Amway ha podido pagar su estudios, transporte, alimentación y los múltiples libros y fotocopias que piden en una universidad.
Su mayor sueño es terminar la universidad y siempre vende sus productos a compañeros y conocidos con ellos pues paga todas las necesidades de primera clase anteriormente mencionadas.
Shirley pide la ayuda para comprar surtido de productos Amway, para vender estos días de vacaciones y juntar el dinero para pagar el próximo semestre universitario y apoyar en los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
She is Shirley, a 24-year-old university student who through sales of Amway products has been able to pay for her studies, transportation, food, and the multiple books and photocopies which are requested in university.

Her biggest dream is to finish university and always sell her products to friends and acquaintances, and that way pay for all of the basic necessities mentioned before. 

Shirley asks for help to buy an assortment of Amway products to sell during these vacation days so she can gather the money to pay for the next university semester and provide financial support for the costs of her home.

loans.use: To buy an assortment of personal products from the Amway brand.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoa has a retail business selling dry food.
Hoa is 48 years old, and she is married with three children.
She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.
In 2014,  Hoa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hoa has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Hoa has been involved in her business for more than ten years.
The main hardship that Hoa faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.
With her business profit, Hoa hopes to maintain a successful business and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoa has a manufacturing business knitting.
Hoa is 41 years old, and she is married with four children.
Hoa lives with four dependents in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
This is Hoa's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Hoa has been involved in her business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Hoa faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.
In the future, Hoa hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Moeu

texts.en:
Moeu is a 29-year-old widowed factory worker who lives with her only child and a niece in Kampong Speu Province in Cambodia. She has worked as a worker since 2011. Her niece is also a factory worker. Both of them can earn $10 each day.

To help improve her traveling conditions, Moeu has decided to get a loan to buy a motorcycle to commute to work. Her future plans are to help her child to earn a bachelor’s degree. She also wants to save money to build a bigger house.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to commute to work

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
La socia Eusebia se sigue dedicando al trabaja en una institucion publica y tambien la socia abrio su tienda donde vende ropa como pantalones,blusas y chompas,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es abrir otra tienda de venta de ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar polos,chompas y pantalones al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Eusebia, continues to make a living working in a public institution. She has also opened her own shop where she sells clothes such as pants, shirts, and sweaters. The member is an entrepreneur woman, and through this medium she wants to move forward. Her dream is to open another clothing store. 

The member is requesting a loan to purchase shirts, sweaters, and pants at wholesale. The member is happy about the loan and agrees to meet the quota payments.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to purchase polos, sweaters, and pants at wholesale

loans.name: Oscar Alberto

texts.es:
Oscar un hombre de 46 años de edad, que se dedica a la reparación de automóviles y motocicletas en un taller que tiene ubicado en la zona de abejorral donde su principal enemigo son el estado de las vías, que hacen que pocos vehículos transiten por esta zona y  propone un verdadero reto a los clientes que acuden a él pues son problemas graves en su vehículo.
Para colmo también tiene que lidiar con mucha competencia en el sector y un cliente lo puede determinar algo tan sencillo como tener la disponibilidad de un repuesto o una máquina para atender oportunamente al usuario.
Oscar quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de una maquina pulidora y repuestos para la reparación de automóviles y bicicletas y con esta ayuda puede generar buenos ingresos para seguir apoyando incondicionalmente a sus dos hijas que tuvo con su ex esposa
texts.en:
Oscar is a 46-year-old man who makes his living repairing cars and motorcycles in a workshop in the Abejorral area.

His main enemy is the condition of the area's roads, which causes not many vehicles to pass through and represents a real challenge to customers that come to him because they have serious vehicle problems.

To top it all off, he also has to contend with a lot of competition in the repair sector, and one customer can determine something as simple as whether he has a part or a machine available to attend to a customer promptly.

Oscar wants to request a loan to buy a polishing machine and spare parts to repair cars and bikes. With this support he can make a good income, so that he can continue the unconditional support that he gives to his two daughters with his ex-wife.

loans.use: to buy spare car and motorcycle parts

loans.name: Blanca Lilia

texts.es: Blanca una temperamental mujer de 56 años de edad, actualmente casada y de su matrimonio nacieron sus tres hijos, siempre ha sido una mujer casera y dedicada a su familia. Con su negocio de venta de alimentos genera recursos para apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y a través de un préstamo que quiere invertir en compra de insumos desde víveres, carnes, granos entre otros busca cubrir los pedidos que tiene ya que por esta época muchas personas recurren a ella para preparar los alimentos y las cenas navideñas
texts.en: Blanca is a feisty 56-year-old woman. She is currently married and has three children. She has always been a housewife and taken care of her family. With her business selling food she generates an income to support her husband with the household costs. She would like to use this loan to invest in supplies including grocery items, meat, and grains. She needs to cover existing orders, since in this season many people come to her for what they need to prepare their Christmas foods and dinners.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, meat, and grains to cover existing orders.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.en: Lorenza is a strong-willed woman who pushes her ability when it comes to her piggery business. She is a hands-on businesswoman and mother who never gets tired of supporting her family. Recently, she requested a loan to purchase bags of animal feed. Aside from her project of adding more pigs for commercial sale, she thought to try traveling boar for her business expansion. Someday she hopes to open a meat shop in a nearby town.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed

loans.name: Dora Elena

texts.es:
La razón por la que Dora aparece en una foto con dos neveras es que ella se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas, lo hace fuera de su casa, donde ha podido acomodar sillas y mesas para la comida de sus clientes.
Dora es una mujer de 55 años de edad, separada de su esposo y ella nunca renuncio a sus hijos y se sintió capaz de sacarlos adelante y desde que tiene su negocio ha podido solventar las necesidades económicas que se presentan en su hogar.
Dora quiere solicitar un préstamo para un nuevo carro de comidas más amplio pues su negocio crece el resto del dinero lo invertirá en la compra de surtido para la elaboración de comidas rápidas como lo son perros calientes, hamburguesa, chorizo, papas a la francesa etc.
texts.en:
The reason that Dora appears in the photo with two fridges is that she sells fast food. She does this outside of her house. She has been able to find a place for tables and chairs for her customers.
Dora is a 55-year-old woman, separated from her husband. She kept her children and felt capable of getting them ahead. Since she started her business she has been able to cover the economic needs of her household.
Dora wants to request a loan for a new, larger food cart; her business is growing. She will invest the rest of the money in the purchase of stock for making fast food such as hot dogs, hamburgers, sausage, french fries, etc.

loans.use: to buy a bigger food cart so she can make more food in less time.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre que trabaja de sol a sol para generar el sustento diario para su familia; que se compone de 5 hijos y su esposa. Manuel tiene 32 años de edad, está casado. 

Él se dedica a la carpintería (elaboración de artículos en madera), esto lo realiza en su casa de habitación; el empezó a ejercer esta actividad desde muy niño, fue aprendiendo la labor por si solo y por la misma necesidad que tenia de cubrir sus servicios básicos. Actualmente lleva muchos años trabajando en la carpintería de donde obtiene los ingresos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia.

El uso respectivo que le dará al préstamo que solicita es la compra de herramientas (sierras, martillos, etc.)que la carpintería necesita. 

Unos de sus principales anhelos o sueños es que en un futuro sus ganancias incrementen y con ellos mejorar el local donde tiene su carpintería y brindarles la educación necesaria a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Manuel works from dawn to dusk to put the food on the table for his family. He is 32 years old, married, and he has five children.

He earns a living as a carpenter (producing wood products) working from home. He began this work very early in life, learning on his own, motivated by his own need to pay for basic services. He's now done carpentry work for many years, and that's how he generates income to cover the family's basic needs. 

The loan is to buy carpentry tools (saws, hammers, etc.). He dreams of generating profits so that he can improve his workshop as well as give an education to his children.

loans.use: to buy carpentry tools.

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.es:
La socia Gloria Eliana se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Gloria Eliana, continues to work in food sales. The member is an entrepreneur woman who, through her business, wants her children to finish their education. 

The member's dream is to  have a big restaurant. The member is requesting a loan to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat. 

The member is happy about the loan and agrees to meet all her quota payments.

loans.use: the member is requesting a loan to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El socio Fernando se sigue dedicando al negocio de agencia de viajes,el socio vende boletos turísticos a las diferentes personas del extranjero y también personas nacionales, el socio es un hombre mur responsable y por medio de este negocio quiere abrir una agencia de viajes y de esta manera crecer como empresario. El socio solicita le crédito para comprar boletos turísticos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Fernando continues to manage his travel agency business. He sells tour tickets to different people who come from abroad, as well as to people from Peru. Fernando is a very responsible man. Through his travel agency, he wants to grow as an entrepreneur.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy tour tickets. Fernando is pleased with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy tour tickets that he can sell.
